title: 来个会上外网的大神帮我下载个东西

replies.author: BensonQC
replies.txt_content:
原帖有句话：
To all the people that asked for a DOWNLOAD LINK, i've decided that I will add more things to the map before releasing it. 
意思就是说作者想要在地图里多加点东西以后再发布存档，所以原帖现在是没有存档的。
